attributes.action: reward businesses for being environmentally friendly
attributes.additional_details: climate change is a huge problem that will affect everyone and many big businesses put lots of pollution into the world and put lots of waste into the world with businesses producing many items with excessive plastic wrapping and with much of this going to waste. along with plastic needing 1000s of years to decompose. our seas filling with plastic and killing many animals and the planet. businesses that work to stop themselves from having high pollution and dropping plastic waste should be rewarded by the government. they should also be recognised and people should be made aware of businesses that work to do this to try and encourage the UK public to shop sustainably.
attributes.background: give rewards like drop tax or encourage people to use businesses who focus on having low levels of pollution and/or plastic waste.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Government already provides some incentives for businesses to operate in more environmentally sustainable ways. You can find more information here: https://www.gov.uk/green-taxes-and-reliefs

You may wish to sign this petition:
Rebuild the economy out of lockdown with a Green New Deal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317343
            
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
